name: The Conveni: Ano Machi wo Dokusen Seyo
overview: The Conveni: Ano Machi wo Dokusen Seyo (ザ・コンビニ ～あの町を独占せよ～) is a business simulation game released for the Sega Saturn and the first in the Conveni series. It is a top-down simulator similar in nature to SimCity, however has the player manage a chain of convenience stores. The game was followed by The Conveni 2: Zenkoku Chain Tenkai da!.
